name: Malverk Android
description: Malverk is an all-in-one texture manager originally developed by Eremel_. This Android port, maintained by Kuroeks, focuses solely on ensuring compatibility while preserving the original features. With an inbuilt API for AltTextures and TexturePacks, Malverk integrates a simple UI to customise which textures are applied to your game whenever you wish.
author: Eremel_, Kuroeks
